title: Triple ginger biscuits
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) butter', '225g (8 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '4 tablespoons black treacle (60g)', '275g (10 oz) plain flour', '1 dessertspoon ground ginger', '1 dessertspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 1/2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root', '50g (2 oz) chopped crystallised stem ginger']
